div.h4: Due to heightened precautions surrounding COVID-19 (Corona Virus) and based on a decision announced by the governor today, April 23, 2020, Athlos Academy of St. Cloud’s school closure will be extended through the end of the academic school year.
div.p: While our school building will be closed through the end of the school year, we will continue to provide learning to all students through our distance learning plan. Our distance learning details are available on our Distance Learning Document.
Meals will still be provided to students through the end of the school year. These resources and details can be found on our website at www.athlosstcloud.org.
We will keep an open line of communication as more information is available including details on grading, belonging pickup, etc.
We are thinking of you all during this time and appreciate your continued support in assuring students are continuing to learn.
For questions, please contact Randy Vetsch at rvetsch@athlosstcloud.org or call (320) 281-4430.
